div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 341 Aghia Varvara, near Eleusis, Attica, (473) 1932 Burial: c. 86 B.C. (T) Contents: 230 AE Athens: 228 New Style (late types) Lemnos, Athenian Cleruchs:2 (Athena hd./ Zeus hd., ΑΘΕ-ΛΗΜΝ) Disposition: Athens Constantopoulos, BCH 1933, p. 238 According to recent information this hd. and nos. 342 and 343 below are very likely from a single find
